intro: Polycarena subtilis, commonly known as the slender waterweed, is a species of aquatic plant belonging to the family Hydrocharitaceae. It is characterized by its long, flexible stems that often float on the water surface or trail beneath it. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically green or white in color. Polycarena subtilis thrives in still or slow-moving freshwater environments. It plays an important role in aquatic ecosystems by providing habitat and oxygen for various aquatic organisms.
